name: Picky Pizza
description:
Picky Pizza is a fast paced card game about making pizzas for the pickiest pizza eaters in the world! Play solo or competitively against a friend. The player who earns the most money by the end of the game becomes the Most Prolific Picky Pizza Provider and wins!

Customers are very picky and they will only eat pizza that is made EXACTLY the way they like it. This requires players to use strategy when trading and drawing ingredients, ordering the cards in their hand, and crossing their fingers that their fiendish opponent doesn't fill the order before they can!

You can choose to play with a friend in the same room passing one device back and forth, invite a friend on Game Center, or even play against the intelligence built into the game.

This game may require internet connectivity (playing against other Game Center players) and subsequent data transfer charges may apply.
